articles.title: Depleted Wellington Phoenix dig deep to draw with Western Sydney Wanderers - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Injury-ravaged Phoenix come away with hard-fought point after defender Louis Fenton scores 79th minute equaliser.
articles.content:
Wellington Phoenix coach Ufuk Talay has praised his injury-ravaged squad for digging deep to clinch a hard-fought point against the in-form Western Sydney Wanderers in Wollongong on Sunday.
